getConfiguration :: FilePath -> IO Configuration

sendMail :: IO Configuration -> IO Text -> [User] -> String -> IO ()

Sends an e-mail with given text to list of users | using given configuration. Throws appropriate error upon failure. | Provide subject of the email as the last argument.
